dialogue: Hey! How are you Cyun? You are looking better today!
I'm sorry you had one of your episodes again. My name is Ryn! I am your friend.
Be careful of the detectors. It seems like anything will set them off.
If they haven't told you, the blue guy is Daun and the creepy girl is Milovia.
The other guy is Lalo! He is pretty nice. Make sure you talk to the other inhabittants. They have interesting stories.
